about.title: About Tanoxi Technology
about.introduction: In 2022, we founded Tanoxi Technology in Nansha, the heart of the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area. Powered by the innovation engine of HKUST(GZ), we unite top global talent to focus on fourth-generation wide bandgap semiconductor technologies.
about.commitment: Tanoxi Technology is committed to independent innovation. We have filed seven core technology patents, covering key processes such as gallium oxide epitaxial growth, ion implantation doping, and device structure design.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Tanoxi Technology, our mission is to bring gallium oxide semiconductor technology from lab to industry—and to the world. Driven by innovation, connected by technology—Tanoxi Technology is pioneering the future of semiconductors!

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We hope to drive revolutionary applications of gallium oxide in next-generation semiconductor technologies.
